MemberSignature.Value: public static int Compare (Android.Text.Format.Time? a, Android.Text.Format.Time? b);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Compare(class Android.Text.Format.Time a, class Android.Text.Format.Time b) cil managed
static member Compare : Android.Text.Format.Time * Android.Text.Format.Time -> int

Docs.summary: Compare two Time objects and return a negative number if a is less than b, a positive number if a is greater than b, or 0 if they are equal.
Docs.returns: a negative result if a is earlier, a positive result if b is earlier, or 0 if they are equal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if is true but hour, minute, and second are not 0.
